introduction: This process outlines the integration of generative AI (GenAI) into various HR functions to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance employee experience. Robust safeguards are implemented to ensure human oversight and ethical compliance. GenAI will augment tasks such as CV review, job specification creation, employee reviews, employee grievance processes, and other standard HR processes.

process_steps.description: GenAI screens CVs, ranks candidates based on qualifications and experience. Human reviewers then assess the top candidates identified by GenAI for cultural fit and soft skills.
GenAI drafts initial job descriptions based on role requirements and industry standards. HR edits and approves the descriptions, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies.

GenAI analyzes performance data from various sources (e.g., project reports, 360 feedback) to provide initial performance insights. Managers then provide personalized feedback and conduct performance reviews.

GenAI triages employee complaints, analyzes the nature of grievances, and suggests potential resolutions. To ensure compliance with GDPR and other privacy regulations, the process includes a step to anonymize sensitive employee data where possible during triage. HR investigates and resolves grievances, ensuring fairness and compliance.
GenAI identifies employee skill gaps through performance data and recommends relevant training programs. HR facilitates training and development opportunities for employees.
GenAI automates onboarding paperwork, provides initial training materials, and answers frequently asked questions. HR conducts in-person onboarding sessions and provides support to new hires.
GenAI generates reports on key HR metrics, such as employee turnover, satisfaction, and training effectiveness. HR analyzes reports to identify trends and improve HR strategies.

reporting_and_analytics.Audit Logs: Records all AI-driven decisions and actions. Audit logs are retained for 3 years to comply with data retention policies and regulatory requirements.

reporting_and_analytics.Employee Satisfaction Surveys: Gathers feedback on employee satisfaction with HR processes.
reporting_and_analytics.Reports on AI Performance: Tracks the performance of GenAI algorithms.
